mapper.select: select count(*) from jadwal_ujian a where 1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into jadwal_ujian ( fk_pelajaran, fk_kelas, start_date, end_date, type, fk_tahun_ajaran, created_date, created_by ) values ( #{fkPelajaran}, #{fkKelas}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{type}, #{fkTahunAjaran}, #{createdDate}, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: update jadwal_ujian set fk_pelajaran = #{fkPelajaran}, fk_kelas = #{fkKelas}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, type = #{type}, fk_tahun_ajaran = #{fkTahunAjaran}, changed_date = #{changedDate}, changed_by = #{changedBy} where pk_jadwal_ujian = #{pkJadwalUjian}
